availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: St. Louis, St. Louis County, Missouri

body.p:
State of Missouri
County of St Louis } SS.

I S. Perit Rawle residing in Saint Louis in the County of St Louis State of Missouri appointed by the Governor of the State of Kentucky a Commissioner for said State to take the proof and acknowledgement of deeds and other instruments, and to administer oaths &c. do solemnly swear that I will well and faithfully execute and perform all the duties of such Commissioner under and by virtue of the laws of the State of Kentucky
Sworn to and subscribed before me this 26th day of March A D 1864

Francis W. Rawle
Notary Public
St Louis County
Missouri

figure.ab:
FRANCIS W. RAWLE
NOTARY PUBLIC
ST. LOUIS MO.

body.p:
Missouri
Comr of Deeds
Oath of S. Perit Rawle
31st Mar/64
